GitHub repository name (e.g., 'kubernetes', 'hello-world')

Cron expression for when to run security analysis (standard 5-field cron syntax). Examples: '30 1 * * 6' (weekly on Saturdays at 1:30 AM UTC), '30 1 * * *' (daily at 1:30 AM UTC), '30 1 1 * *' (monthly on 1st at 1:30 AM UTC). Recommended: weekly
Human-readable description of the schedule (e.g., 'Weekly on Saturdays at 1:30 AM UTC', 'Daily at 1:30 AM UTC')
Publish results to enable Scorecard badge and REST API access? (true/false - recommended: true for public repos)
Is this a private repository? (yes/no) - Private repos need additional permissions to detect SAST tools and query commits
Maximum number of concurrent pull requests for Renovate (recommended: 3-10, leave empty for default: 10)
Maximum PRs per hour for Renovate (0 for unlimited, recommended: 2-5, leave empty for default: 0)
Enable Renovate dependency dashboard issue? (true/false - shows all pending updates in one place, leave empty for default: true)
Enable Renovate OSV vulnerability alerts? (true/false - checks dependencies for known vulnerabilities, leave empty for default: true)
Schedule for Renovate dependency checks (text format like 'before 5am on monday', 'after 10pm every weekday', 'every weekend', leave empty for default: 'before 5am on monday')
Group non-major dependencies into single PRs in Renovate? (true/false - reduces PR volume, leave empty for default: true)
Auto-merge minor and patch updates in Renovate? (true/false - automatically merges non-breaking updates, leave empty for default: false)
Auto-merge security updates in Renovate? (true/false - automatically merges security patches, leave empty for default: false)

Days before closing stale PR (recommended: 7-14, leave empty for default: 7)
